mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point( pointName, bookId, chapterId, number, createTime, createId )VALUES( #{pointName}, #{bookId}, #{chapterId}, #{number}, #{createTime}, #{createId} )
INSERT INTO pointExerciseDetail( userId, exerciseCycle, pointId, bookId, nextExerciseTime )VALUES( #{userId}, #{exerciseCycle}, #{pointId}, #{bookId}, #{nextExerciseTime} )
mapper.select: select * from point t where t.id=#{id}

SELECT t.userId , t.bookId, a.pointName, t.nextExerciseTime, t.exerciseCycle, t.conCorrectNumber, t.conErrorNumber, t.firstExerciseDate, t.lastExerciseDate, t.exerciseNumber, t.correctRate, t.correctNumber, t.errorNumber, t.avgConsumingTime FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE a.id=t.pointId AND t.pointId=#{id}
SELECT t.* FROM pointExerciseDetail t WHERE t.pointId=#{id}
SELECT t.id,t.pointName,t.number,t.chapterId ,t.bookId FROM point t ,pointExerciseDetail a WHERE t.id=a.pointId AND a.userId=#{userId}
